doc.previous: See also Battle of Nam Bac
doc.after: In the far northwest Team Fox an intelligence team of Mien hill tribesmen began long range reconnaissance of southern China  In July Royal Lao Government RLG forces seized the Nam Bac Valley Three Infantry Regiments one independent infantry battalion and one artillery battalion took Nam Bac and established a defensive line north of Luang Prabang 80
